rooms.description: A welcoming space with a reception counter and display area for the building's facade.
An expansive living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
A dining space integrated with the kitchen, designed following Vastu principles for harmonious energy flow.
Modern kitchen with ample storage and work area, ensuring compliance with safety norms and efficient workflow.
Small guest toilet positioned near the living room for convenience.
A large open courtyard acting as a natural light well and ventilation hub.
Spacious master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom, designed to face east as per Vastu for positive energy.
Cozy bedroom for children with views overlooking the courtyard and north-facing window.
Fully furnished bathroom integrated into master bedroom following modern design norms and Vastu guidelines.
